archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0079
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to access GST reciepts for all the payments I've made to Vodafone for my products I have relevant role profiles for, so that I can access these for accounting purposes

properties.value: OOTB Assumption: GST is one of the document types. All document types will be discussed during the Financial workshop

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
